alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Hampton; Inland Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 8:03PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG THIS EVENING... Patchy dense fog will continue to develop across far interior Southeast Georgia and Southeast South Carolina this evening. The nature of the fog will be such that conditions could change rapidly over very short distances with visibilities dropping to 1/4 mile or less at times. Motorists should remain alert to these conditions. Some locations that could see dense fog this evening include Millen, Statesboro, Sylvania, Hilltonia, Allendale, Hampton and Walterboro. The risk for fog will continue overnight and a Dense Fog Advisory could be needed.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and leave extra distance ahead of you in case a sudden stop is needed.
